data.pageText: An administrative agency is an official governmental body empowered with the authority to direct and supervise the implementation of particular legislative acts. Simply put, an agency is a governmental body that does part of the government’s work. In addition to the word “agency,” such governmental bodies may be called commissions, corporations, boards, departments, or divisions.

An administrative agency is an official governmental body empowered with the authority to direct and supervise the implementation of particular legislative acts. In addition to the word “agency,” such governmental bodies may be called commissions, corporations, boards, departments, or divisions. Here are some examples of federal administrative agencies.
Select each tab to <add specifics on what the students will learn/review>.

The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is part of the United States Department of Justice. The FBI has the full authority and responsibility to investigate crimes and defend the U.S. from security threats. For more information on the FBI, please visit this link: FBI website.

Here are steps you need to fallowing while you have a screen text and tab component with audio
  1. Define the following parameter for screen text audio  preload="true" (will load the audio file before displaying the page) playOnLoad="true" (will start playing the audio file as soon as page is display)
  2. Add in XML tab component  audioPlayOnload="true" (it will tell to play the audio of first slide to play after playing the screen text audio)
  3. Define the name of audio file to play per slide for the li element of the tab 

The Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) is part of the United States Department of Labor and their mission is to assure safe and healthful working conditions by setting and enforcing standards and providing training, outreach, education, and assistance. For more information on OSHA, please visit this link: OSHA website.

The Social Security Administration (SSA) is an independent administrative agency that delivers a broad range of services that meets the changing needs of the public. For more information on the SSA, please visit this link: SSA website. sound.transcript:
Calculating Total Capacitance

When one or more capacitors are connected, how do we calculate the total capacitance? Let’s find out.

Select the tabs to learn more.

Capacitors in Parallel
Total capacitance of capacitors in parallel is calculated as follows:
Total Capacitance is equal to Capacitance of Capacitor C1 plus Capacitance of Capacitor C2

Capacitors in Series
Total capacitance of capacitors in a series is calculated as follows:
One divided by CT equals to one divided by C1 plus one divided by C2 plus one divided C3 etc. or CT equals to one divided by one divided by C1 plus one divided by C2 plus so on till one divided by CN.

Capacitors in Series
Total capacitance of capacitors in a series is calculated as follows:
One divided by CT equals to one divided by C1 plus one divided by C2 plus one divided C3 etc. or CT equals to one divided by one divided by C1 plus one divided by C2 plus so on till one divided by CN.
